name: You in Pride and Prejudice
description:
My "Close-Reading Project II" for my British Literature class. The goal was to take a passage from something we've read and explore different ways that the story could go. I tried to have a mix of funny and serious routes! 

I'd love to add more to it at some point (I had ideas for how to incorporate other characters) but for now, you can play as Mr. Collins and experience 13 different endings.
